title: The New MET Estro Mips Road Helmet is Built for Comfort and Safety
content:
The MET Estro MIPS is a road-specific helmet with 26 vents, a dedicated sunglasses port, and a comfort-driven fit – all at a decent price (for high-end, feature-packed helmets). With ventilation a priority in the design, 17 of the Estro MIPS’ 26 vents are inlets and nine are exhaust holes. The helmet features MET’s Safe-T

The post The New MET Estro Mips Road Helmet is Built for Comfort and Safety appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Andrew Marshall
